teal.render.geometry

Class AxisShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.render.geometry.AxisShape

  • public class AxisShape
extends java.lang.Object
    A geometry generation utility class that lofts a polygon by rotating it around 0,0,0; y values are not changed. Note all x values should be >= zero.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.5 $
    Author:
    Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger

      • makeGeometry

        public com.sun.j3d.utils.geometry.GeometryInfo makeGeometry(javax.vecmath.Point2f[] pts,
                                                            int segments,
                                                            javax.vecmath.Point2f center,
                                                            int xTiles,
                                                            int yTiles,
                                                            double latheAngle,
                                                            double latheAngleOffset)
        this constructs a geometry of indexed Quads swept around the Y axis. The specified points are used to define the Y components of the quads the number of segments are used to define the X component of the Quads. By default texture-mapping coordinates are defined for the verticies wrapping in a right-hand mode.

      • getGeometry

        public static com.sun.j3d.utils.geometry.GeometryInfo getGeometry(javax.vecmath.Point2f[] pts,
                                                                  int divs,
                                                                  javax.vecmath.Point2f center)
